name: angular14-react
description: This project shows an example of using Webpack 5 Module Federation for Angular `14.2.0` app with injected remote React `18.2.0` module. NGXS state management is used in Angular app, state is shared between Angular app and React module. Angular app was developed based on the example `angular11-microfrontends-ngxs`.

scripts.e2e:ci: pnpm run start & wait-on http-get://localhost:4201/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress-e2e/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress-e2e/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
